title: Norwich murder probe: Three teens arrested over Vale Green stabbing
article: Three teenagers have been arrested on suspicion of murder after an 18-year-old was fatally stabbed on a housing estate. Joe Dix died at the scene after the incident at Vale Green, Norwich, just before 19:00 GMT on 28 January. Norfolk Police earlier arrested a 17-year-old boy and two 18-year-old men on suspicion of murder. Post-mortem tests showed Mr Dix died as a result of significant blood loss caused by stab wounds. Seven people have so far been arrested in connection with Mr Dix's death. A man in his 20s, a woman in her 30s, a man in his 40s and a 17-year-old boy have all been released under investigation.
